definition: current situation/circumstances/current trend
o'clock/time/when/hour/season/period
surname Shi
power/influence/potential/momentum/tendency/trend/situation/conditions/outward appearance/sign/gesture/male genitals
Time makes the man (idiom). The trend of events brings forth the hero.
unconventional
to examine and judge the situation

sentences.english: You may not be able to control the times, but you can compose your response.
sentences.chinese: 你也許不能控制時勢，可是你能夠冷靜應對。

sentences.english: The third is about the people involved in the war situation and the times in the role of prophets.
sentences.chinese: 三是涉及對有關人物之於戰局和時勢作用的預言者。

sentences.english: This is also the result of historical trends and situational changes.
sentences.chinese: 這是歷史潮流所向，時勢劇變所致。

sentences.english: I just follow the trend and usually it works out.
sentences.chinese: 我只是順應時勢，而且通常有用。

sentences.english: Therefore the prudent shall keep silence in that time;
sentences.chinese: 所以通達人見這樣的時勢，必靜默不言。

sentences.english: No body asks be Hero, Just some times Trans-up their way.
sentences.chinese: 沒有人想當英雄，只是時勢造就英雄。

sentences.english: With regard to the change of time, every one's heart is a mirror.
sentences.chinese: 對時勢的推移來說，每一個人的心都是一面鏡子。

sentences.english: Someone once said that the circumstances create heroes.

definition: turbulent situation/changing (face, scene, situation, world of etc)
situation/circumstance
to surge like a gathering storm (idiom)/to grow by leaps and bounds
to take turns/to work by roster
in an instant a myriad changes (idiom); rapid substantial change
see 承前啟後|承前启后[cheng2 qian2 qi3 hou4]
to work out a strategy/to come up with a plan for
changeable situation (idiom)
flourishing and still in the ascendant (idiom); rapidly expanding/still growing strong/on the up
a hundred schools of thought contend (idiom); refers to the classical philosophic schools of the Warring States period 475-221 BC
lit. mustn't speak of two things on the same day (idiom); not to be mentioned in the same breath/incomparable
pinyin: bu4 ke3 tong2 ri4 er2 yu3

definition: civil society
to offer advice/to make a suggestion
unity of will is an impregnable stronghold (idiom)
state policy
outmoded conventions/old-fashioned ways
